pli-tv-bi-vb-pc93:6.1: Tena samayena buddho bhagavā sāvatthiyaṃ viharati jetavane anāthapiṇḍikassa ārāme.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc93:6.2: Tena kho pana samayena bhikkhuniyo gihiniyā ummaddāpentipi parimaddāpentipi.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc93:6.3: Manussā vihāracārikaṃ āhiṇḍantā passitvā ujjhāyanti khiyyanti vipācenti—
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc93:6.4: “kathañhi nāma bhikkhuniyo gihiniyā ummaddāpessantipi parimaddāpessantipi, seyyathāpi gihiniyo kāmabhoginiyo”ti.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc93:7.1: Assosuṃ kho bhikkhuniyo tesaṃ manussānaṃ ujjhāyantānaṃ khiyyantānaṃ vipācentānaṃ.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc93:7.2: Yā tā bhikkhuniyo appicchā … pe … tā ujjhāyanti khiyyanti vipācenti—
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc93:7.3: “kathañhi nāma bhikkhuniyo gihiniyā ummaddāpessantipi parimaddāpessantipī”ti … pe …
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc93:7.4: “saccaṃ kira, bhikkhave, bhikkhuniyo gihiniyā ummaddāpentipi parimaddāpentipī”ti?
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc93:7.7: kathañhi nāma, bhikkhave, bhikkhuniyo gihiniyā ummaddāpessantipi parimaddāpessantipi.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc93:7.8: Netaṃ, bhikkhave, appasannānaṃ vā pasādāya … pe …
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc93:7.9: evañca pana, bhikkhave, bhikkhuniyo imaṃ sikkhāpadaṃ uddisantu—
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc93:8.1: “Yā pana bhikkhunī gihiniyā ummaddāpeyya vā parimaddāpeyya vā, pācittiyan”ti.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc93:9.4: … pe … ayaṃ imasmiṃ atthe adhippetā bhikkhunīti.
